definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: An aerated biological filter was used to pretreat the alkaline wastewater in refinery.
sentences.chinese: 采用曝气生物滤池氧化工艺对炼油厂碱水进行预处理。

sentences.english: A week-old strike now touches all 12 of France's refineries.
sentences.chinese: 一周前的罢工现在影响到法国全部12家炼油厂。

sentences.english: The economic feasibility of application of hydraulic turbine in a 1.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了炼油厂中液力透平的应用方案，以1。

sentences.english: Oil distillation process is the first working procedure of the refinery and petrifaction enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 原油蒸馏过程是大型炼油厂和石化企业的龙头工序。

sentences.english: The refinery fire sent a plume of thick black smoke from blazing spherical storage tanks.
sentences.chinese: 从燃烧的炼油厂球形储藏罐中冒出一股黑色的浓烟。

sentences.english: Giant fireballs rise from a burning oil refinery in Ichi …
sentences.chinese: 千叶县市原市的一处炼油厂升起巨大火球。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the optimization and automation of line-up in piping systems of petroleum refinery.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论炼油厂输油管网调线的最优化与自动问题。

sentences.english: and refiners are required to blend ethanol into their gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 同时，炼油厂还被要求将乙醇掺混到他们的汽油之中。

sentences.english: The NMT is a very worthy octane value of oil refinery to improve.
sentences.chinese: NMT是炼油厂极有价值的辛烷值改进剂。

sentences.english: Without it we wouldn't have powerlines or oil refineries.
sentences.chinese: 没有它，我们就不会有各种电力线或炼油厂。

sentences.english: An oil refinery near the city was on fire, with dozens of storage tanks under threat.
sentences.chinese: 该市附近的一处炼油厂起火，数十个储油罐面临威胁。

sentences.english: The mechanical seal leakage of hot oil pump has always been an important problem for oil refineries.
sentences.chinese: 热油泵机械密封的泄漏一直是炼油厂关注的重要问题。

sentences.english: Alkali dregs wastewater is one of the major pollution in refineries.
sentences.chinese: 碱渣废水是炼油厂油品精制过程产生的高浓含酚废水。

sentences.english: Deep processing of heavy oil is an important route in refinery.
sentences.chinese: 提高重质油深加工是炼油厂挖潜增效的重要途径。

sentences.english: Refineries lack the excess capacity to absorb the kind of oil Opec produces.
sentences.chinese: 一些炼油厂缺少过剩产能来吸收欧佩克增产的那些油。

sentences.english: An oil refinery near Tokyowas on fire, with dozens of storage tanks under threat.
sentences.chinese: 靠近东京的一家炼油厂失火，数十个油罐受到威胁。
